northern_leaf_blight.name: Baka Jani la Kaskazini
northern_leaf_blight.description: Ugonjwa wa fangasi unaosababisha mabaka marefu ya kijivu kwenye majani.
northern_leaf_blight.recommendation: Tumia mbegu zinazostahimili ugonjwa na kuzungusha mazao.

common_rust.name: Kutu ya Mahindi
common_rust.description: Viupele vidogo vya rangi ya kahawia pande zote za jani.
common_rust.recommendation: Nyunyizia dawa ya ukungu mapema dalili zinapoonekana.

gray_leaf_spot.name: Baka Jani la Kijivu
gray_leaf_spot.description: Mabaka ya mstatili yanayofuata mishipa ya jani.
gray_leaf_spot.recommendation: Ondoa mabaki ya mazao yaliyoathirika shambani.

healthy.name: Afya Njema
healthy.description: Mmea unaonekana kuwa na afya bila dalili za ugonjwa.
healthy.recommendation: Endelea na utunzaji bora wa shamba.
